SEARCH
Package com.gcu.cst339_group5.controller

Class GameAddController

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.cst339_group5.controller.GameAddController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/games") public class GameAddController extends Object
Controller for handling requests related to adding new games.

Provides endpoints for displaying the "add game" form and processing form submissions. Uses GameService to persist new games in the database.
